---

## Documentation Review Checklist

Before contributing to this project, please review the following documentation and check off each item:

### Required Reading
- [ ] [README](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/README.md) — Project overview and purpose
- [ ] [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) — Contribution guidelines
- [ ] [LOCAL_SETUP.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/docs/LOCAL_SETUP.md) — Local development setup
- [ ] [SECURITY.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/SECURITY.md) — Security policies and best practices

### Optional but Recommended
- [ ] [TESTING.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/docs/TESTING.md) — Running tests locally
- [ ] [CI_CHECKLIST.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/docs/CI_CHECKLIST.md) — CI/CD pipeline steps
- [ ] [AUTOMATION_SCRIPTS.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/docs/AUTOMATION_SCRIPTS.md) — Using project automation

### Access & Setup
- [ ] GitHub account access confirmed (check via `gh auth status`)
- [ ] GCP project access confirmed (check via `gcloud auth list`)
- [ ] Local development environment set up (check via `docker-compose ps` or `python --version`)

### Before Opening a PR
Please ensure:
- [ ] All required documentation has been reviewed
- [ ] Access requirements are met (GitHub, GCP)
- [ ] Local setup is complete and tested
- [ ] You understand the contribution workflow

---

## About This Template

This checklist ensures all contributors:
- Have the context needed to contribute effectively
- Understand security policies and best practices
- Have a working development environment
- Are aware of available tools and scripts

**Questions?** Open an issue or check the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/kushin77/GCP-landing-zone-Portal/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
